Name: Pokitaire
About the game: Poker meets Solitaire in this innovative new mashup! Pokitaire is a fresh mix of Solitaire and Poker... Drag cards between Solitaire stacks to create poker hands, like a full house or royal flush. Each new hand increases your score multiplier to get you to the top of the leaderboards!
